title: bhaktiyOga sangIta mArgamE
sahitya:
bhaktiyOga sangIta mArgamE parama pAvanamAghumE taghumE


anupallavi

  rakti rAgamaya layam isai ellAm bhakti illAviDil phalan 
viLaiyAdu (orupOdum) shakti illAviDil shivan uLadEdu


caraNam    rAma nAma rasa rAsa nAmam rAgamoDu iNaiyum pOdellAm anurAgam 
rAgamoDu shonnAl aduvE nalamAm hari nErAi vandAl innum orupaDi mElAm
